name: marathon-lb
preInstallNotes:
We recommend a minimum of 0.5 CPUs and 256 MB of RAM available for the Marathon-LB DCOS Service.

*NOTE*: ```Enterprise Edition``` DC/OS requires setting up the Service Account in all security modes. 
Follow these instructions to setup a Service Account: https://docs.mesosphere.com/1.8/administration/id-and-access-mgt/service-auth/mlb-auth/
postInstallNotes:
Marathon-lb DC/OS Service has been successfully installed!
See https://github.com/mesosphere/marathon-lb for documentation.
postUninstallNotes: Marathon-lb DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
